document_data.title: Introduction to Advanced Dungeons & Dragons
document_data.author: [[Richard Baker III]], [[David Cook]], [[Kevin Melka]], [[Bruce Nesmith]]
document_data.Description:
''Introduction to Advanced Dungeons & Dragons'' is designed to serve as a comprehensive entry point for new players to the complex and immersive world of ''Advanced Dungeons & Dragons''. This set aimed to streamline the onboarding process for those unfamiliar with role-playing games or the extensive lore and mechanics of ''Dungeons & Dragons''.

The set included a variety of components designed to facilitate a smooth introduction to the game. These components included rulebooks, adventure modules, character sheets, and dice, among others. The rulebooks provided a condensed overview of the game's mechanics, focusing on character creation, combat, spellcasting, and dungeon exploration. This was complemented by a series of introductory adventures, which were specifically crafted to guide new players and Dungeon Masters through their initial gaming sessions, emphasizing learning through gameplay.

It addressed common barriers to entry for new players by simplifying complex rules and presenting them in a clear and engaging manner. Additionally, the set included pre-generated characters, allowing players to jump into the game quickly without getting bogged down in the initially daunting process of character creation.
document_data.Contents:
;Introduction to the Player's Handbook
* Introduction
* Player Characters
* Rules
* Wizard's Spells
* Cleric's Spells

;Introduction to the Dungeon Master Guide
* About Adventures
* [[Introduction to Advanced Dungeons & Dragons/The Tomb of Damara|The Tomb of Damara]]
* The Town of Freedale
* [[Introduction to Advanced Dungeons & Dragons/The Ghost of Harrow Hill|The Ghost of Harrow Hill]]
* [[Introduction to Advanced Dungeons & Dragons/Under Mount Dread|Under Mount Dread]]
* Making Up Your Own Adventures

;Introduction to the Monstrous Manual
* Monsters
* Treasure Types
* Treasure Generation
* Treasure List
